author: dims
msg: move the web site into site directory

author: felicity
msg: remove the various dbg() functions in almost all of the modules and just use a typeglob to point at the main dbg() that they all call.  this removes the extra overhead of having excess functions and function calls for dbg() which is called a bajillion times.  also, make the plugins use the documented M::SA::Plugin::dbg(), which is also a typeglob so the plugins point the same place for now...

author: felicity
msg: bug 3777: instead of code (and plugins) accessing DEBUG and facilities variables from the Mail::SpamAssassin package directly, call dbg_check() and info_check() functions.  can optionally pass a facility to check, and if the facility is prepended by '+', the 'all' facility will be ignored (good for 'is facility X specifically enabled' ...)   also changed the Razor2 debugging to only show razor-agents debug only if the razor2 facility is enabled.
